name: Target Game
author: ywkls
info: This is designed to make a game with targets with varying points that will bounce horizontally around the room. Have up to 31 targets in a room. Set up so you can only win the game once.
description: Consists of 3 scripts. A global script, to initialize the counter. A moving target script and a target game script. Can move vertically, horizontally or diagonally.
setup: Std.zh is required.For the target script-Set Vx or Vy to positive to avoid unintended behavior.//D0- How many points this target gives.//D1- What Lweapon triggers it.For the Target Game script-//D0- How many points nets a prize.//D1- What you get for winning.//D2- Message to play when you get the item.//D3- What script number the targets run.
